1{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Tree of tokens
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree.TokenTree
7  ( -- * Type
8    TTree, NamedTree, NamedTrees,
9
10    -- * Pattern
11    -- ** Term leaf
12    pattern TermLeafName,
13    -- ** Text leaf
14    pattern TextLeaf,
15    pattern TextLeafRaw,
16    pattern TextLeafAttr,
17    pattern TextLeafAttr2,
18    pattern TextLeafQ,
19    --pattern TextLeafQQ,
20    --pattern TextLeafKey,
21  ) where
22
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token            as S
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree.Bracket    as S
26
27
28-- --------------------------------------------  Token tree
29
30-- | Tree of tokens.
31type TTree = B.CodeTree S.BracketType S.Token
32-- | Pair of token trees and its name.
33type NamedTrees = B.Named [TTree]
34-- | Pair of token tree and its name.
35type NamedTree = B.Named TTree
36
37
38-- --------------------------------------------  Pattern
39
40-- | Term leaf.
41pattern TermLeafName  cp w  = B.TreeL (S.TTerm  cp w)
42
43-- | Text leaf.
44pattern TextLeaf form cp w  = B.TreeL (S.TText   cp form w)
45-- | Text leaf of 'S.TextRaw'.
46pattern TextLeafRaw   cp w  = TextLeaf S.TextRaw cp w
47-- | Text leaf beginning with single hyphen.
48pattern TextLeafAttr  cp w  = TextLeaf S.TextRaw cp ('-' : w)
49-- | Text leaf beginning with double hyphens.
50pattern TextLeafAttr2 cp w  = TextLeaf S.TextRaw cp ('-' : '-' : w)
51-- | Text leaf of 'S.TextQ'.
52pattern TextLeafQ     cp w  = TextLeaf S.TextQ   cp w
53-- | Text leaf of 'S.TextQQ'.
54--pattern TextLeafQQ    cp w  = TextLeaf S.TextQQ  cp w
55-- | Text leaf of 'S.TextKey'.
56--pattern TextLeafKey   cp w  = TextLeaf S.TextKey cp w
57
